Author: ready2rope
Text: Do your parents know about your ED in much detail? Try something like, “all other food gives me anxiety. These few foods don’t make me panic like regular food does, so I need them to feel safe and comfortable.”

Author: scaredyk4t
Text: Hmmm...maybe try to explain that these are foods that really make you feel comfortable without over eating? Or what you can easily eat without over thinking it? Just things that make eating easier for you?   Do they know about your ed?   If they don’t I would just start buying my own stuff and say fuck off lol.
